name: Thomas Cat Litter, 16 L, Pack of 1
description: Thomas Cat Litter is the suitable choice for cats that are equally picky and discerning, as it is made of all natural minerals that are safe for the use of your furry little ones and soft on their paw pads.

name: Sheba Premium Loaf Chicken
description: Treat your furry friend to the delectable taste of tender chicken loaf. Sheba Chicken Premium Loaf Pouch Wet Kitten Food is a culinary delight that will have your cat purring with satisfaction wanting a second dinner.
